runs.comm: One slip in. Gambhir is beaten rightaway. Full in length, just outside the off stump and holding its line, Gambhir went for an expansive drive on the up but doesn't make contact
India are up and away, courtesy a leg-side wide.
short in length, angling away from Gambhir who has a poke and a miss. He wanted to run it away to third man but was beaten by the extra bounce
fuller, curving in, trying to trap him lbw but Gambhir puts bat to ball and manages to squeeze it to wide mid-on
short in length, zipping past the off stump, Sehwag has a tentative poke and a miss. He withdrew his bat at the last minute. Well.. tried to as the ball flew past the outside edge.
outside edge flies to left of third man. Fullish, shaping away, outside off and Sehwag has his customary flash at it.

hits the deck short of length, on the middle stump line, holds its line, Gambhir hops up and is struck on the thigh pad and the ball drops in front of him. Both rush across for a quick single and Lee rushes after the ball, picks up, swivels around and fires in a direct hit at non-striker's end but Gambhir is home.

Charges out to a length delivery on the off stump line and slices it over cover point. Lee gets across from wide third man and almost had it covered with a dive but can't stop it cleanly and it rolls over the ropes
slipping to the pads, Gambhir tries to glance, misses and it runs off the pad
fuller, straighter, on the stumps, Gambhir is caught at the crease, lunges forward to play it across the line and gets a leading edge to backward point
on a length, around middle and off stump line, coming in, Gambhir leans forward to defend
Smoked over mid-off. Full in length, just outside off stump, no swing and Gambhir knifed through the line.
short in length, angling in towards middle stump and Gambhir goes back to push it to the off side
yorker on the middle and off line and hello?! it was a mere push from Sehwag. I thought it would roll to left of mid-on but instead, it keeps going and runs away to the long-on boundary.
Lee gets his revenge. It landed on a length, outside off stump and shaped away, Sehwag, struck adhesively to the crease, flashed at it, bat away from the body ,and nicks it behind. Lee strikes.
short of length, around the off stump, Robin pushes it to point
Cracking bouncer and ouch. Robin takes his eyes off and tries to duck under. The ball crashes into the left glove and pops up but falls short of the slip. That was a pacy bouncery
short in length, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot to cover point
another bouncer, outside off stump and this time Robin has no problem in swaying away. The previous one had darted at him and hence the trouble
He is caught at cover but hold on its a no-ball! Full in length, slanting away from Gambhir who tries to drive over the infield and ends up slicing it high to extra cover where its caught but ...
bangs it short and it climbs up over the stumps, Robin goes for a pull shot but can't connect
fuller, straight and Robin leans forward to play a neat pick up stroke over midwicket. Wristy stroke.
nice shape away. Full and on the off and middle line, shaping away, Robin plays it carefully to cover point
appeal for lbw. Short in length, curving in to cramp up Gambhir who stabs at it. The ball evades the prod and crashes into the back thigh in front of leg stump.
beaten Again he gets it to swing away, Full and outside off stump, Robin is sucked into a forward prod
And again. Quite an impressive start  from Ben.  He is getting it to curve it away from the right-hand batsman
short and rising, on the leg side, Gambhir goes for a glance and it keeps climbing and evades a diving Gilly
short in length, around off stump, pushed towards backward point and Clarke swoops and has a shy at the non-striker's end, misses and gives away four overthrows
no-ball and a four. Huge front-foot no ball, short and at the rib-cage, Robin shuffles in to clip it to fine-leg boundary.
Robin makes use of the free hit. He walks down in his unique way and carves a length delivery outside off through extra cover. 18 runs so far in this over.
short of length, outside off stump, punched to point
short in length, on the off and middle again, pushed to extra cover for a single
bangs it in short, comes in at the body, Gambhir hops up, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and fends it to short fine leg
full and outside off stump, mistimes a drive to cover
fullish, curving in, on the middle and leg and Gambhir plonks his front out forward before swinging the ball away past square leg.
back to short of length, again shaping in to Gambhir who clips it to square leg .India off to a flier here
that Uthappa walk again. Walk and whack. He reaches the pitch of a length delivery on the middle and swings it imperiously over midwicket
another no ball,. another free hit coming up. full and on the off stump line, driven to wide mid-on for a single

fires in a bouncer, climbing head-high and Gambhir pulls it away, in the air, to Haddin, standing near the ropes, at long leg. Haddin backpedals to take the 'catch' but realises he is going to go over the ropes and drops it in front of him as he steps over the boundary..  Hmm.. the third umpire thinks he has touched the ropes while he was still in possession.
leans forward to drive to mid-off and will retain the strike
on the pads, tucked past square leg
hits the deck short of length, bounces almost chest-high and Uthappa hops up to get on top of the bounce and clips it behind square leg for a single
another short one, at the body, Gambir short-arm pulls it away, fast and past the diving long leg fielder
fuller in length this time, around the off stump, Gambhir tries to cut it late and gets a bottom edge on to the ground and it bounces to Gilchrist
tries to do a 'Uthappa'. He walks down the track but hesitant steps unlike Uthappa's and pushes a length delivery which goes past the outside edge
slower, around 121 kmph, short in length, on the middle stump line, pushed to the off side and Clarke gets across to make the stop
short and spinning down leg side, pulled away to Lee at long leg. Uthappa might think he missed out on a four there
flighted from round the stumps, outside off stump, Gambhir comes down the track and drives inside-out to wide long-on where Ben makes a sliding stop
short in length, spinning in from the middle, Uthappa tries to lap it around the corner but misses and is struk on the pad
comes down the track to heave a flighted delivery to deep midwicket
quicker, on the middle and off, pushed to cover point
short in length, lands on the leg stump line and holds its line, Gambhir is struck on the pad as he jabs at it. Gilchrist appeals but he is the lone man shouting. It was going over.
short in length again, just outside off stump, Uthappa goes back and taps it close on the off side and they get across in a flash for a quick single. These two are running quite well
sharp bouncer, over the middle and leg, Gambhir shuffles across as he tries to pull but is beaten for pace and by the extra bounce
charges out this time but misses an intended hoick across the line and Gilly gathers
full and swinging but its way down the leg side and neither Gambhir nor a diving Gilchrist can't reach it. The camera pans to Ponting who doesn't look too chuffed.
tip and run. Length delivery on the off and middle, tapped close on the off side and they charge across
yorker on the off and middle line, jabbed away and again they take a quick run. One look at each other and they are off.
floated on the middle and leg, spinning down leg, tickled to right of short fine leg
from round the stumps, full and straight, driven to long-on for a easy single
Reverse sweep is being unfurled. It was full and on the leg stump line, Uthappa reverse sweeps it past backward point.
flighted, on the middle and leg, swung across to long leg
floated on the off stump line, punched to Hayden at sweeper cover
slipping down leg side, short in length and Uthappa laps it around the corner to fine leg boundary
from round the stumps, full and on the leg side, turned to long leg for a single
landed on a length, around the off stump and spun past the hesitant prod
And Clarke strikes. Similar delivery, turning past the off stump, Uthappa tries to play a cute late cut and the ball runs off the face of the bat and into Gilchrist's gloves.
lands outside off stump and goes away with the arm. Yuvraj Singh tries to slice it away and is beaten
on the middle stump line, spinning in slightly, tickled behind square leg for a single
from over the wicket, short in length, slow through the air, just outside off stump, chopped to short third man
long hop and Yuvraj puts it away with ease. He leans back to pull it to deep midwicket boundary
places a ball to backward point for a quick single. Symonds doesn't collect the throw cleanly and it rolls away to long on but there is no overthrow
floated outside off stump, punched to deep cover
arm-ball, quickish, coming in towards middle stump, jabbed away to cover
slightly short in length, cut away to deep point
again a touch short in length, outside off stump, cut to sweeper cover
tries to play it to the on side and is beaten
brings up his fifty with a dab to square leg. He is really playing well tonight
What a fab piece of timing. It was floated full and outside off stump, Yuvraj went down on his knee to slog-sweep it over deep midwicket boundary.
and now picks up a single with a nudge to the on side. The runs keep coming
two more as Gambhir goes on the back foot to cut it late through backward point
leans forward to drive to long-on
tries to repeat that slog-sweep but is struck on the pad. Clarke had slowed up the pace this time and Yuvraj was early into the sweep.
full in length, on the off stump line, Gambhir pushes it cautiously down the track.

Gambhir is standing outside the crease and plays a lovely crispy cut shot. It was a tad short in length, just outside off stump, not much room but Gambhir cuts it through backward point. Good piece of timing and well placed.
slower one, down the leg side, Gambhir tries to glance and misses
off cutter, on the middle and off line, Gambhir leans forward to tap it gently on the off side.

cuts in from the good length, on the middle stump line, Gambhir tries to open the bat-face and push it to the off side for a single but sends it straight down the track and Bracken rushes across to prevent the possibility of a single.

manages to get his placement right this time; dabs towards backward point and sets off for a quick run. The throw from Clarke breaks the sticks at the non-striker's end and runs away to the boundary. Tough luck.
short in length, rising, at the body, Yuvraj is hurried on the pull shot and gets a single as the ball rolls away to the leg side
full in length, slipping down leg, Yuvraj waits on the ball before clipping it to fine-leg boundary. Bad delivery that.
banged in short, at the body, on the middle and leg, pulled away to left of fine leg for a single
yorker on the off stump line, Gambhir jabs it to cover
wide down the leg side. Clarke's woes continue.
fuller, on the middle and leg, flicked away behind square leg for a single
backs away to the leg side, Clarke fires it in, just short of the blockhole, on the leg and middle stump line and Yuvraj drills it to long-off
on the middle line, Gambhir tries to tuck it to the on side and gets a leading edge down the track
on the middle and leg line, full in length, clipped to midwicket
yorker ends up a low full toss, on the middle and leg, flicked away to deep square leg
another low full toss, on the middle stump line, swatted to midwicket
Gambhir falls after a very valuable knock. Banged in short, on the middle stump line, Gambhir skied a pull shot towards mid-on where it was safely held. Good innings though. He paced it pretty well.
another bouncer and it sails over Yuvraj who asks the umpire whether it was a wide. Nope.
on the middle stump line, curving in with the usual Hilfenhaus angle and tucked to the leg side
length delivery, homing in on the off stump, Dhoni eases it to cover .
fullish, on the middle and leg line, Dhoni lunges forward and push-drives it towards long-on for a single
Six over fine leg. Banged in short, on the middle and leg and Yuvraj swivels off the front foot to pull it over the ropes. The equation swings towards India
Another pull, another six, this time over long leg. On the middle and leg and Yuvraj  sent it soaring over the ropes where a ball boy clangs it.
he is some hurry to finish things off. He moves outside leg stump and Clarke follows him with a fuller one, pushed back down the track
again he backs away, its a yorker on the middle and Yuvraj mistimes a drive to long-on and will retain the strike.
slower off cutter, turning in from leg stump line, Yuvraj waits on the ball before turning it to short fine leg region
drifting to the pads and turned to fine leg for a single. India need just 8 more.
yorker outside off and Yuvraj tries to dab it through the slip region but makes no contact
moves outside leg stump, its a length delivery curving in on the leg stump line, pulled to Ponting at midwicket
fuller, just outside leg stump, Yuvraj misses his drive and the ball rolls off the pad to third man region
yorker on the middle and leg, jabbed away to the on side for a single.
A stunning pull for a six over long leg. Game over. Lee banged it in short, on the middle stump line and Dhoni unfurled a feisty pull over the ropes. India have ended the series on a Twenty20 high.
